name: get_vehicle_models
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool car_utils.
Tool description: FREE resources for checking VIN, getting the market value of your car, estimating the cost of ownership in US,  checking fuel economy, and more to come.
API description: Fetches all supported vehicle models for a specified vehicle make using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

make.description: The brand of the vehicle for which to fetch the models.
